note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Income has been [equivalized](#dod:equivalization).
title: Mean income per month within the 4th decile (after tax)
subtitle: The mean income per month within the 4th decile (tenth of the population). This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. Income here is measured after taxes and benefits.
